text.tspan: Share of children engaged in labor by gender, 2023
Share of children aged 5â€“17 years which are engaged in economic activity. Child employment is defined based
on the amount of time spent participating in economic activities during the reference week of a survey.

Data source: UNICEF and International Labour Organization
